Articles.Content:
Hey fellow rocketeers

I've just downloaded and installed the Curse client. I tried to add KSP to the list of games which is supported...

But it won't do it (obviously since I write here )... I tried to find the specific KSP folder.

I looked around on google and learned that this issue is known but have not been able to find a solution.

Thanks in advance
The Curse client does not yet support KSP, this will change in time but for now we have to download addons and install them manually.
Arh okay, that explains it then! Thank you for the quick response
Yet another reason they shouldn't have used curse... The client doesn't work.

Yet. I think you'll find a lot of first implementations aren't the best and require tinkering to make work as well as they can.

Besides, from what I've seen it's currently better than SpacePort.
It seems it is much much more practical to administer ones mods, so I, for one, am excited
